modName: No Floating Ice or Rocks for Tropical Skyrim
summary: Removes the floating rocks (that were retextured from floating ice) from Skyrim. Designed for Tropical Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Are you sick of seeing weird floating rocks in Tropical Skyrim? These Rocks textures replaced the floating ice that was there before. I simply went in and deleted those specific ice models. Works with Regular Skyrim too (does not require Tropical Skyrim), but not recommended as the large floating ice chunks add immersion.

This Includes Floating Icebergs/Rock...bergs? as well

If there are any I somehow missed, let me know in the posts section.

update: 11/22/14 added an option for just getting rid of the ugly small floating ice chunks/sand texture for use with tropical OR vanilla skyrim.

If anyone downloaded the original version, please redownload as I missed some rocks
author: unearthlycrowbar

files.name: No Floating Ice or Rocks
files.changelogHtml: Added some rocks/ice I missed on the first release (that should be all of them, if not let me know)
